contentrichtext.text: '''Yushan''' may refer to: {{hatnote|see also: [[Jade (disambiguation)]]}} ==People's Republic of China== * [[Yushan County]] (玉山县), Jiangxi * [[Yushan District]] (雨山区), Ma'anshan, Anhui ;Towns * [[Yushan, Fuding]] (嵛山镇), in [[Fuding]], Fujian * [[Yushan, Hubei]] (峪山镇), in [[Xiangzhou District, Xiangyang]] * [[Yushan, Jinxiang County]] (鱼山镇), in [[Jinxiang County]], Shandong Written as "玉山镇": * [[Yushan, Jian'ou]], [[Jian'ou]] City, Fujian * [[Yushan, Weng'an County]], [[Weng'an County]], Guizhou * [[Yushan, Suiping County]], [[Suiping County]], Henan * [[Yushan, Kunshan]], [[Kunshan]] City, Jiangsu * [[Yushan, Lantian County]], [[Lantian County]], Shaanxi * [[Yushan, Linshu County]], [[Linshu County]], Shandong * [[Yushan, Bazhong]], in [[Bazhou District]], Bazhong, Sichuan * [[Yushan, Pan'an County]], [[Pan'an County]], Zhejiang ==Taiwan== * [[Yushan (mountain)]] (玉山), the highest mountain in Taiwan * [[Yushan National Park]] (玉山國家公園), the highest, largest, and least accessible national park in Taiwan * [[Yushan Range]] (玉山山脈), one of the five major mountain ranges in Taiwan ==Historical== * Yushan 馀善, the abode of Dong Yue 东越 king of the Han dynasty, the best-preserved Han city in southern China (N.Fujian) {{geodis}}
